directions: Place pork loin, salsa, and chipotle peppers in a slow cooker. Pour in enough water to cover the pork halfway.
Cook on High until pork is very tender, 4 to 5 hours.
Transfer to a cutting board; shred with a fork and knife.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chipotle peppers in adobo sauce
title: 4-Ingredient Slow Cooker Pulled Pork
